ygData.subject: Re: Long time no see
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hail fellow knights, I ll try to answer you questions as best as I can.  For the Ghoulsbane stats, I ve heard that its 1 handed, 15 dmg, 35 or 38 delay,
ygData.messageBody:
cybrwzrd@... wrote:

> Hello all,I am just wondering, what is the best place to gain levels
> at lvl 17 soloing. I keep getting bashed by sandgiants in oasis and
> want to find a safe, not very crowded spot to gain leves at. Also What
> are the stats on the Ghoulsbane Dmg/del ratio etc. Also what about
> other holy swords. Also had anyone heard of when the two other
> continents are coming up? and what changes will that make to the
> gameing system, will there be more spells, access to lvls higher than
> lvl 50 etc.Thank youLaurana HighwindPaladin of Tunare, 17th rankThe
> RatheList Moderator

Hail fellow knights,

I'll try to answer you questions as best as I can. For the Ghoulsbane
stats, I've heard that its 1 handed, 15 dmg, 35 or 38 delay, and casts
dismiss undead for 140-150 pts of damage. As for a good area to fight,
try East Karana. There's a hill where gnoll reavers, war wolves, and
lions spawn during the day, and undead reavers and spirit stalkers at
night. Be warned though.......bring a group with you. There have been
times when my full party had 3 or 4 creatures on each person. Plus, the
guards at the farms will not kill spirit stalkers. The hill is
especially dangerous at night, but the exp is great. Good luck!

Valandil Lightstrider
Paladin of the Lightbringer, 23rd rank
Karana
